text: Ranger is a 1997 Indian Malayalam film directed by KS Gopalakrishnan.http://spicyonion.com/title/ranger-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== *Tiger Prabhakar as Tiger *Devan as Prof Devan *Anju as Remya *Ilavarasi as Rekha *Kalabhavan Narayanankutty as Kittu *Baburaj as Baburaj *Gayathri as Anjali *Sharmily as Mariya ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Ranger (film)
